This is a game that simulates a duel between two duellists, taking turns attacking and defending.
One duellist is controlled by you and the other by CPU. You will start by attacking on Turn 1, then defending on Turn 2, attacking again on Turn 3 and so on until the end of the game.
Both duellists start with 100 HP and the first to drop to zero, loses the game.
